resource.chars:
I. Observatio Eclipsis Solaris +

November 27 1722 PM. Grenovici 
h. ‘. “
1.29.16.   Eclipsum jam inceptam vide’
1.31.16.    Distantia Cuspidum 7’.4” unde pars deficiens 
     0’.47” ac Milium verum 1h.28’.58”.
1.34.18.    Distantia Cuspidum 10’.50”
1.42.28.    vere  16’.20”
1.43.26.    Inclinatio Cuspidum ad dextrum 44.30’
2.32.37.    Partes Lucide residue 17’.20”
2.40.16.    repet. in med. Eclipsis proxime.  17.9
3.28.45.    Inclinatio ad Sinistras 19.0’
3.31.45.    Distancia Cuspidum 15’.21”
3.37.35 repet.  10.50
3.43.25 Finis Eclipseos dubius, ob Umbrum Solis
aequorum ob undulantem, nec sat bene definitum 
3.43.44.    Crete depirat Eclipsis.
Cello toto tempore serene et tranquille 
+ ab Edmundo Halleyo LL.D. R.S.S. Astron. Reg. & Geom.
Prof. Savin. Oxon.

Copy’d
